# Binmucker

> Digital portfolio and project hub by Conor Chepenik. Bitcoin educator, builder, and daily writer.

For full details see: https://binmucker.com/llms.txt

## Quick Summary

Binmucker.com is the personal site of Conor Chepenik featuring:
- Free breathing exercise app (5 patterns, no account needed)
- Browser-based Space Invaders game (5 levels, power-ups, endless mode)
- Curated Bitcoin and finance tools
- Daily writing on Medium
- Contact form

## Key Links

- Home: https://binmucker.com
- Breathe Better: https://binmucker.com/breathe
- Space Invaders: https://binmucker.com/space-invaders
- Contact: https://binmucker.com/contact
- Sitemap: https://binmucker.com/sitemap.xml
